remarks: Minimality property of a generated filter: every filter that contains ` B ` contains its generated filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2015.)
statement: fgmin $p |- ( ( B e. ( fBas ` X ) /\ F e. ( Fil ` X ) ) -> ( B C_ F <-> ( X filGen B ) C_ F ) ) $.
